description:
A Kiss Note is a powerful notebook that makes anyone who has their name written together will instantly fall in love if they kiss each other regardless of any circumstances. This magical and very familiar item belongs to an angel named Guri whose job as cupid is to create couples. However, she accidentally writes down Aino Seiji, a regular high school student, and unless he kisses someone, Guri will die. She convinces Seiji to go kiss his crush, Hiyama Akane, the school's popular girl who turns out has even stronger feelings for him, bordering on obsessive and psychotic. Eventually Akane and Seiji come together but not before Guri decides that she likes Seiji as well. What seems awesome to most guys becomes hell for Seiji who just wants a normal relationship with girls.

(Source: IMDB)
synonyms: The very lovely tyrant of love♥

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Sadism
tags.description: Prominently features characters deriving pleasure, especially sexual gratification, from inflicting pain, suffering, or humiliation on others.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mariko_itoh222) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/okome2014/)

In 2008, she married fellow animator [Tatsufumi Tamakawa](https://anilist.co/staff/109607/Tatsufumi-Itou), who changed his name to Tatsufumi Itou after marrying her. 

Her husband passed away from a brain hemorrhage on May 23, 2020.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [painter](https://anilist.co/staff/194863/)._

Affiliated with Atelier Platz.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._

[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)
• [Keiichi Hirokawa](https://anilist.co/staff/156490/Keiichi-Hirokawa)
• [Kuniyuki Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/154774/Kuniyuki-Takahashi)
• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)
_Note: Not to be confused with the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/155544/)._

[Profile](http://earlywing.co.jp/talent_w/otsuboyuka.php) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/00tsubo_yuka) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/43ZsqoTPYf5cc4ae3KPVuU?autoplay=true)

Yuka Ootsubo is a Japanese voice actress and singer affiliated with Early Wing. In 2014, she started her career as a singer by joining the band SmileY inc. with Vocaloid musician Yuuyu-P. She also did the voice of Vocaloid character Azuki Masaoka for V4.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Kaalaa Baunaa - Reverse 1999 (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hiroXtana)

Hiroyuki Tanaka is a producer. Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/117045/) with the same name.

name.native: ウェイクアップ ガールズ

node.description:
__[Website](https://wug-portal.jp/)__ | __[Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/wakeupgirls/)__

__Formed:__ April 1, 2013

__Wake Up, Girls!__, otherwise known through the abbreviation WUG is a Japanese voice actress (seiyuu) collaboration signed under record label DIVE II Entertainment, which was initially made for the anime franchise [Wake Up, Girls!](https://anilist.co/anime/19023/Wake-Up-Girls/).

__Members:__
- [Mayu Yoshioka](https://anilist.co/staff/118477/Mayu-Yoshioka) (吉岡茉祐) - Member Color: Red
- [Airi Eino](https://anilist.co/staff/118471/Airi-Eino) (永野愛理) - Member Color: Indigo
- [Minami Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/118473/Minami-Tanaka) (田中美海) - Member Color: Yellow
- [Yoshino Aoyama](https://anilist.co/staff/118475/Yoshino-Aoyama) (青山吉能) - Member Color: Turquoise
- [Nanami Yamashita](https://anilist.co/staff/118472/Nanami-Yamashita) (山下七海) - Member Color: Purple
- [Kaya Okuno](https://anilist.co/staff/118474/Kaya-Okuno) (奥野香耶) - Member Color: Green
- [Miyu Takagi](https://anilist.co/staff/118476/Miyu-Takagi) (高木美佑) - Member Color: Orange

(Source: [Wikipedia (JP)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wake_Up,_Girls!_(%E5%A3%B0%E5%84%AA%E3%83%A6%E3%83%8B%E3%83%83%E3%83%88), edited)
